item.title: jedberg talk at Airbnb

item.description: I was along at this talk last year, and just now found it online - was one of the most informative talks i've been to, learned loads from it -

item.title: PostgreSQL on AWS
item.author: Thorsten Sideb0ard
item.description: Excellent video specifically for PostgreSQL on AWS, however the principles are pretty universal information for running anything on AWS -
